SELECT f.feed_num, f.mbr_id, f.mni_num, f.feed_food_intake, f.feed_content, f.mc_num, f.feed_date, f.feed_intake_date, f.feed_like, f.feed_open_status, fi_feed.file_path AS feed_file_path, fi_feed.file_new_name AS feed_file_name, fi_member.file_path AS member_file_path, fi_member.file_new_name AS member_file_name,
mll.mni_name, mll.mni_picture, mll.mni_weight, mll.mni_kcal, mll.mni_carbo, mll.mni_protein, mll.mni_fat, mll.mni_sugar, mll.mni_cholesterol, mll.mni_sodium, mll.mni_calcium, mll.mni_iron, fc.fc_content
FROM feed f INNER JOIN meal_nutrition_info mll ON f.mni_num = mll.mni_num LEFT JOIN files fi_feed ON f.feed_file_index = fi_feed.file_idx LEFT JOIN member m ON f.mbr_id = m.mbr_id LEFT JOIN files fi_member ON m.mbr_file_idx = fi_member.file_idx LEFT JOIN feed_comments fc ON f.feed_num = fc.feed_num
ORDER BY f.feed_date DESC;

SELECT f.mni_num, mll.mni_name, mll.mni_weight, mll.mni_kcal, mll.mni_carbo, mll.mni_protein, mll.mni_fat, mll.mni_picture, mll.mni_sugar, mll.mni_cholesterol, mll.mni_sodium, mll.mni_calcium, mll.mni_iron FROM meal_nutrition_info mll INNER JOIN feed f ON mll.mni_num = f.mni_num

SELECT f.feed_num, f.mbr_id, f.mni_num, f.feed_food_intake, f.feed_content, f.feed_picture, f.mc_num, f.feed_date, f.feed_intake_date, f.feed_like, f.feed_open_status, m.mbr_file_idx, fc.fc_content, mll.mni_name, mll.mni_picture, mll.mni_weight, mll.mni_kcal, mll.mni_carbo, mll.mni_protein, mll.mni_fat, mll.mni_sugar, mll.mni_cholesterol, mll.mni_sodium, mll.mni_calcium, mll.mni_iron FROM feed f INNER JOIN meal_nutrition_info mll ON f.mni_num = mll.mni_num INNER JOIN member m ON f.mbr_id = m.mbr_id LEFT JOIN feed_comments fc ON f.feed_num = fc.feed_num WHERE f.feed_num = #{feedCode};
SELECT mni_name FROM meal_nutrition_info WHERE mni_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed ( feed_num, mbr_id, mni_num, feed_food_intake, feed_content, mc_num, feed_date, feed_intake_date, feed_like, feed_open_status, feed_file_index ) VALUES ( #{feedCode}, #{memberId}, #{mealNutritionInfoCode}, #{feedFoodIntake}, #{feedContent}, #{mealCategoryCode}, NOW(), #{feedIntakeDate}, 0, #{feedOpenStatus}, #{feedFileIdx} )
mapper.update: UPDATE feed SET feed_like = feed_like + 1 WHERE feed_num = #{feedNum}
UPDATE feed SET feed_like = feed_like - 1 WHERE feed_num = #{feedNum}
